message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $22,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can come to an agreement closer to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $18,000.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $22,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. This offer reflects a fair compromise.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I still believe we can reach a better agreement. I would like to propose a price of $19,000.
